title: Integrated Module Design for Education for Sustainable Development (ESD) and Physics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics theories and experience with corporate sustainability policies
context.additional_context: Training for administrators/leaders, emphasizing practical approaches applicable to daily tasks

learning_goals: Development of educational materials integrating physics principles and ESD concepts through ASSURE model-based module design
Application of sustainable development values (energy efficiency, resource management, etc.) to physics cases using integrated curriculum strategies
Design of formative assessment tools to quantitatively measure improvements in learners' ESD comprehension

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
